name: In the secret garden
description: In the secret garden  With the many shadows  Plants, lamps and witnesses  Black worms, ornaments, lipsticks, lashes  Memories touching surface  Doors open and close  Russian whisper on the stairs  Of bullets, manifestos, dynamite  Eye shadows, glowing legs  Proof of heaven  Mirror space  Follow the lines of our former lives  Licking vitamins  From your soft skin  In the late October light  Subjects of reflections  Holding lovers promises  Aftershaves  Airports  But broken by the day     Hans Heiner Buhr Pur Pur, Tbilisi, 18.10.2018
